pages.text: Scattered around the Vault Rooms are different types of chests, each containing a different varienty of loot. $(br2)Each type of chest has different loot tiers, $(l)Common, Rare, Epic and Omega$()
The Ornate chest contains items focused on $(l)Gear and Crafting$() like various Ingots, Vault Scrap, Vault Plating, Magnetites, Focuses and Unidentified Vault Gear.
The Living chest contains items that focuses on $(l)Progression$() like Mob Drops, Vault Meat, Burger Parts and Eternal Souls.
The Wooden chest contains a big variety of (Vault) items, but also contains $(l)Driftwood$().
Gilded Chests contains items that focus on $(l)Vault Enhancing$(), like Vault Diamonds, Catalysts, Key Pieces, Flasks and Carbon.
Altar chests appear when a $(l)God Altar$() is completed. It contains Idols, Runes, Vault Essence and a variety of other items.
Treasure Chests only appear inside Treasure Rooms. Treasure Chests contain a variety of $(l)high tier items$(), like Extraordinary Gems, Vault Gear and Mod Items.
